PROPERTY: Install from Install Application task sequence
SCCM_GET_API: SCCM_GeneralInformationTabProperties $AppID 'Install from Install Application task sequence' $SessionID

AS_VALUE:
MinimumOSVersion GreaterEquals 8.0
OperatingSystem OneOf {iOS/iPad_5,iOS/iPad_6,iOS/iPad_7,iOS/iPad_8,iOS/iPhone_5,iOS/iPhone_6,iOS/iPhone_7,iOS/iPhone_8}
Ownership Equals Personal
Ownership NotEquals Company
